struct cvmx_psm_ecc_ctl_s cnf75xx

Detailed Description

cvmx_psm_ecc_ctl

This register is used for controlling ECC and injecting errors (SBE/DBE) into the PSM memories. When error injection is enabled and a write occurs to the specified address, the syndrome will be flipped as directed.
